 Mustex stared her down with his usual poker face.
Mustex:I'm Mustex. I'm with the Maximals,but my loyalty to them is 
limited to a desire to protect those I feel are my people. I see no 
reason to fight if you do not agress me.

 O.k. Cyberwolf I'm about to leave for vacation so you can do 
whatever. Just get  him face to face with Veratis if you can and I'll 
take it from there.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ice watched the new bot carefully hoping that he wasn't a scout for 
an
> attacking faction. "I'm Icebird, my friends call me Ice, it's a 
pleasure to
> meet you." she tried to rush the pleasantries knowing that 
something was
> going to happen soon. Whatever happened wasn't going to be 
pleasant. "What
> faction are you with? the mutant asked trying to get as much 
information as
> possible so she could figure out what to do next. She tried to keep 
her mind
> clear so she could detrect anyone else but her nerves made it 
extremely
> difficult to think.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <dewboy30816@y...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Saturday, July 21, 2001 10:44 AM
> Subject: Re: where the mutants are.
> 
> 
> > Mustex stared at her nervously. He could tell she wasn't with the
> > "Alliance",but he didn't reconize the Mutant insignia. Even if he 
had
> > she had no reason to trust him(Cyberwolf after today copy your 
post's
> > and send them to rks_3@h... if they concern me).
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > >  .
> > >
> > > Ice crouched, ready to attack when she caught something from his
> > thoughts.
> > > This bot wasn't with the Alliance. The mutant female stared at
> > Mustex
> > > allowing her thoughts to be directed to him. "Quiet, neither 
one of
> > us is
> > > supposed to be here." she thinks hopeing her thoughts don't 
stray.
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > > Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 9:15 AM
> > > Subject: Re: where the mutants are.
> > >
> > >
> > > > O.k. then. He traced that signal and found ice.
> > > > Mustex:I need to find Veratis. I have technology he can use if
> > he'll
> > > > do a favor for me.
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > > > OK, to clear a few things up, Lunarpine, Razor Claw, and
> > Foxfingers
> > > > are on
> > > > > Spain searching for clues to the dissapearance of Silver 
Scout
> > > > >
> > > > > Ice is on Alliance island doing the same, nobody posted 
that the
> > > > shields
> > > > > were up so her flight is legal.
> > > > >
> > > > > Lady Hawk is being held inside Alliance base waiting to be
> > released
> > > > after
> > > > > creating two monsters for Zardus.
> > > > >
> > > > > Veratis is in his base discussing things with Grizzltron in
> > Norway.
> > > > >
> > > > > and Megaton is somewhere in North America licking his 
wounds.
> > > > >
> > > > > Veratis doesn't believe in destructive hand weapons but that
> > > > doesn't mean
> > > > > that they're wimps or defenseless. find a sight with the 
mutants
> > > > file cards
> > > > > and you'll see what I mean.
> > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > From: <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > > > > Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 3:56 AM
> > > > > Subject: Re: Alliance
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > > WELL HOW'D THE MUTANTS GET THERE IN THE FIRST PLACE! 
Shileds
> > > > aren't
> > > > > > invincible you know. Remember when Black Aracnia helped
> > Turantulas
> > > > > > steal a stasis pod.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > > > > > > Feels good to finally have the time to make a nice long
> > post :-)
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > LegendaryNemasis, you might find Zardus's insight cheap 
in
> > this
> > > > > > post and future ones. However, there was a faction a long 
time
> > > > ago in
> > > > > > this RPG called the Energonians. They were energy beings 
much
> > like
> > > > > > yours, just they used energon energy instead of 
chaotican, and
> > > > Zardus
> > > > > > had a long rivalry with their leader (who happened to be 
one
> > of
> > > > the
> > > > > > bots that helped Zardus and Wolfgang make the Alliance), 
so he
> > > > knows
> > > > > > how to handle energy beings.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > And the guy who controls Mustex: how'd Mustex get onto
> > Alliance
> > > > > > Island? The shields were up.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > ::Zardus/FZ/DevilDuer/Mosquitor::
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Zardus frowns, thinking Frostbite's transmission over 
for a
> > > > second
> > > > > > and then replying. "I would preffer meeting in neutral
> > territory.
> > > > > > Would the peninsula near my base be convenient for you?"
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > He closes that link, and recieves Orchestra's 
transmission.
> > > > "This
> > > > > > is Zardus, Alliance commander. I'll lower the shields so 
that
> > you
> > > > can
> > > > > > get through. I'll be outside, we can meet there."
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > He walks toward the exit, looking at his wrist comp and
> > tapping
> > > > a
> > > > > > few buttons, making a search for "Infecticons". The search
> > yields
> > > > no
> > > > > > matches. Zardus traces the Infecticon transmissions back 
to
> > their
> > > > > > origin, then makes a search for any bots that the Iron 
Fist's
> > > > > > scanners detected traveling in that direction.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > "Interesting..." he says to himself, watching video 
footage
> > of
> > > > > > Vampiza flying over Alliance Island, surrounded by 
Chaotican
> > > > energy.
> > > > > > He zooms in, looking the bot over.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Uncanny resembalance to Energonians, he thinks to 
himself,
> > > > > > activating his comm to Daemos: "Daemos, can you report to 
my
> > > > position
> > > > > > as soon as possible? I need you to accompany me 
somewhere."
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Zardus ends that transmission as well, exiting the base 
and
> > > > seeing
> > > > > > a bot firing. He frowns, tapping a few buttons to turn the
> > > > autoguns
> > > > > > off, and begin lowering the shields.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > "You're either very brave or very stupid," he says,
> > approaching
> > > > the
> > > > > > shields on the other side of which was Chaostaur 
(whatever his
> > > > name
> > > > > > is). "Attacking a military installation single-handedly 
is a
> > very
> > > > > > suicidal task."
> > > > > > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > > > > > FZ nods, looking over the beasts once more.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > "Yes. I must admit I wasn't expecting you to accomplish
> > this."
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > He turns and walks toward the exit, the door opening.
> > "Would you
> > > > > > like a shuttle to get back to wherever you are from, or 
would
> > you
> > > > > > rather fly by yourself?"
> > > > > > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > > > > > DevilDuer waits for Coput to get into the pilot seat, so
> > that
> > > > they
> > > > > > can get going and he can get away from these weirdos. :-)
> > > > > > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > > > > > Mosquitor is hit by Hurricane's shots (post 38120. 
Sorry for
> > > > taking
> > > > > > so long to reply), stumbling a bit.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > "Traitor! Hell Beast will have your head!" he yells and
> > lunges
> > > > at
> > > > > > Hurricane again, swinging a large insect leg at him.
> > > > > >
